mechanics.outcome: Target weapon becomes a magical weapon for the spell's duration

mechanics.condition: Attack is made using the affected weapon AND spell is active
mechanics.outcome: Add +1 bonus to the Attack Roll

mechanics.condition: Damage is dealt using the affected weapon AND spell is active
mechanics.outcome: Add +1 bonus to the Damage Roll

description_text: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.
